27 void md49_encoders_callback(const custom_messages::md49_encoders& md49_encoders){
28 
29  // Write data read from MD49 into
30  // sqlite3 database md49data.db
31  // ******************************
32  // EncoderL & EncoderR
33  cx = snprintf (sql_buffer,400,"UPDATE md49data SET EncoderL=%i, EncoderR=%i WHERE ID=1;", md49_encoders.encoder_l, md49_encoders.encoder_r);
34  execute_update_sqlite();
35  // Encoderbytes 1-4 left
36  cx = snprintf (sql_buffer,400,"UPDATE md49data SET Encoderbyte1L=%i, Encoderbyte2L=%i, " \
37  "Encoderbyte3L=%i, Encoderbyte4L=%i WHERE ID=1;", md49_encoders.encoderbyte1l, md49_encoders.encoderbyte2l, md49_encoders.encoderbyte3l, md49_encoders.encoderbyte4l);
38  execute_update_sqlite();
39  // Encoderbytes 1-4 right
40  cx = snprintf (sql_buffer,400,"UPDATE md49data SET Encoderbyte1R=%i, Encoderbyte2R=%i, " \
41  "Encoderbyte3R=%i, Encoderbyte4R=%i WHERE ID=1;", md49_encoders.encoderbyte1r, md49_encoders.encoderbyte2r, md49_encoders.encoderbyte3r, md49_encoders.encoderbyte4r);
42  execute_update_sqlite();
43 }

45 void md49_data_callback(const custom_messages::md49_data& md49_data){
46  // SpeedL, SpeedR, Volts, CurrentL, CurrentR, Error, Acceleration, Mode, Regulator, Timeout
47  cx = snprintf (sql_buffer,400,"UPDATE md49data SET SpeedL=%i, SpeedR=%i, " \
48  "Volts=%i, CurrentL=%i, CurrentR=%i, Error=%i, Acceleration=%i, Mode=%i, " \
49  "Regulator=%i, Timeout=%i " \
50  "WHERE ID=1;",md49_data.speed_l,md49_data.speed_r,md49_data.volts,md49_data.current_l,md49_data.current_r,md49_data.error,md49_data.acceleration,md49_data.mode,md49_data.regulator,md49_data.timeout);
51  execute_update_sqlite();
52 
53 }
54 
55 int main( int argc, char* argv[] ){
56 
57  // Init node
58  // *********
59  ros::init(argc, argv, "sqlite_controller" );
60  ros::NodeHandle n;
61  ros::Subscriber md49_encoders_sub = n.subscribe("/md49_encoders", 10, md49_encoders_callback);
62  ros::Subscriber md49_data_sub = n.subscribe("/md49_data", 10, md49_data_callback);
63  ros::Rate loop_rate(2);
64  ROS_INFO("sqlite_connector running...");
65  ROS_INFO("=============================");
66  ROS_INFO("Subscribing to topic /encoders");
67  ROS_INFO("Subscribing to topic /md49data");
68 
69  // Open sqlite database md49data.db
70  // ********************************
71  open_sqlite_db_md49data();
72  ROS_INFO("Opend md49data.db database");
73 
74  // Mainloop
75  // ********
76  while(n.ok()){
77 
78  ros::spinOnce();
79  loop_rate.sleep();
80 
81  }// end.mainloop
82  sqlite3_close(db);
83  return 1;
84 }// end.main
85 
86 
87 // Open sqlite db md49data.db and create
88 // table md49data if not existing
89 // *************************************
90 void open_sqlite_db_md49data(void){
91 
92  // Open database md49data.db and add table md49data
93  // ************************************************
94  rc = sqlite3_open("data/md49data.db", &db);
95  if( rc ){
96  ROS_WARN("Can't open database md49data.db: %s,", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
97  //fprintf(stderr, "Can't open database: %s\n", sqlite3_errmsg(db));
98  exit(0);
99  }else{
100  ROS_INFO("Opened database md49data.db successfully,");
101  //fprintf(stdout, "Opened database successfully,\n");
102  }
103 
104  // Create table md49data
105  // *********************
106  sql = "CREATE TABLE md49data(" \
107  "ID INT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL," \
108  "Encoderbyte1L INT DEFAULT 0, Encoderbyte2L INT DEFAULT 0," \
109  "Encoderbyte3L INT DEFAULT 0, Encoderbyte4L INT DEFAULT 0," \
110  "Encoderbyte1R INT DEFAULT 0, Encoderbyte2R INT DEFAULT 0," \
111  "Encoderbyte3R INT DEFAULT 0, Encoderbyte4R INT DEFAULT 0," \
112  "EncoderL INT DEFAULT 0, EncoderR INT DEFAULT 0," \
113  "SpeedL INT DEFAULT 0, SpeedR INT DEFAULT 0," \
114  "Volts INT DEFAULT 0," \
115  "CurrentL INT DEFAULT 0, CurrentR INT DEFAULT 0," \
116  "Error INT DEFAULT 0, Acceleration INT DEFAULT 0," \
117  "Mode INT DEFAULT 0, Regulator INT DEFAULT 0," \
118  "Timeout INT DEFAULT 0 );" \
119  "INSERT INTO md49data (ID) VALUES (1);";
120 
121  /* Execute SQL statement */
122  rc = sqlite3_exec(db, sql, NULL, 0, &zErrMsg);
123  if( rc != SQLITE_OK ){
124  ROS_WARN("SQL message: %s", zErrMsg);
125  //fprintf(stderr, "SQL message: %s\n", zErrMsg);
126  sqlite3_free(zErrMsg);
127  }else{
128  ROS_INFO("table md49data created successfully");
129  //fprintf(stdout, "table created successfully\n");
130  }
131 }
132 
133 void execute_update_sqlite(void){
134  rc = sqlite3_exec(db, sql_buffer, NULL, 0, &zErrMsg);
135  if( rc != SQLITE_OK ){
136  ROS_WARN("SQL message: %s", zErrMsg);
137  //fprintf(stderr, "SQL message: %s\n", zErrMsg);
138  sqlite3_free(zErrMsg);
139  }else{
140  //fprintf(stdout, "Operation done successfully\n");
141  }
142 }
